seedGroups.name: Shattering
seedGroups.description: Shattering seeds can be tough to visually judge for ripeness. Use a *gentle* touch test to see if the seeds easily loosen.

species.description: Shattering. Thalictroides is Latin for “thalictrum-like” and this is clear in the similarity of the seeds and leaves. The leaf arrangement & plant size is clearly different: a small whorl of leaves for this ankle-high species, and bushier for the shin- to knee-high Thalictrum.
